This is really a nice watch for the price! I had a difficult time finding a rose gold watch that would fit a very small wrist without difficult adjustments, and this is exactly what I wanted. I would highly recommend this watch for anyone with a small wrist who doesn't need a watch that breaks the bank. You could actually get all 3 colors for a very reasonable price!

I had a silver bangle watch years ago and loved it. Then I got a Gucci one as a gift that finally died this year. I tried this since it was simple and elegant. They send you a little tool so you can adjust the watch band to size. This was very easy and I had it fitting in no time! I wear this almost everyday. It will dull over time but then my Gucci did as well. You can always buff it out if you want.

The watch is very dainty and beautiful. I was excited that this ran on the larger sized and is slightly loose on my wrist. Being a bigger girl finding a watch to fit my wrist has been a challenge. This one fit and gave me some room for it to move so it's not catching or pinching when I move. It's light weight so I don't even notice I'm wearing it.

The watch is very pretty and looks just as shown in the picture, however the item came very large and didn’t fit around my wrist. When I went to take some links out, using the tool and instructions provided, the instructions given were for a different type of watch and the tool just bent as soon as used. Also, the pins were rusty which meant it was extremely difficult to take even one pin out let alone the amount needed to adjust the watch. The watch isn’t adjustable because of this, and also the battery wasn’t working. Even when I replaced the battery, the watch didn’t work. This may have been one bad case, but unfortunely now I have a really pretty but unusable and useless watch

评论概述: Nice with rose gold colored trim
评论详情: Nice watch, but I thought it had a yellow gold colored trim, not rose gold, to match my rings.  Can't find a similar black watch with yellow gold trim on Amazon! Love the look, and size. I don't recommend original packaging for a  gift.

I have had my eye on this watch for a long time. I used to wear a watch all the time and when my last watch broke, I never replaced it.  I am very fussy about the fit of my watch. It can’t be too loose and sloppy, but I also don’t want it to be too tight either.  This watch is dainty and beautiful!  It has nice tiny little links so you can size it in small increments to fit just right!! I was nervous about sizing and adjusting it myself after reading the reviews, but my 10-year-old son helped me and between the two of us we were able to hold things and tap the pins out and back in place fairly easily.  It only took us a few minutes and I had it fitting perfect!
I love how it looks and it fits perfect. It is a beautiful watch.

I am a woman with very big wrists. I've always bought men's watches because I couldn't get a women's watch that fit me. After seeing all the complaints about how big this one was, I thought - perfect! Exactly what I need!! I had to have a watch with a small face for work at a casino, and I really don't like being without a watch! This one fit perfectly when I first got it. I wear it daily and often fall asleep wearing it.  I have lost about 10 lb since purchasing it, and now I'm scrambling to dig out the link removal tool, but for those women who don't have dainty wrists, you can finally get a delicate looking watch - I get complements on it frequently!

评论概述: Go someplace that can adjust the watch when you buy it!
评论详情: Cute watch but being adjustable is a joke! You can take it apart but getting it back together is a joke! The pieces are are so tiny it’s difficult to hold onto to them with fingers or even needle nose bead pliers (they are small) The watch ended it getting thrown away because we couldn’t find the pins that popped out of our grasp and shot across the floor.

This is not a tiny wrist friendly watch. I had to remove three links, this was a struggle because the instructions and tools suck. I also still can't figure out how to clasp the watch so if anyone knows how please help. If you don't know how watches work like me, then I would get one of those cute stretchy ones instead, this ones way to difficult. Also I probably should have expected it but you can hear the watch ticking, so if you get easily annoyed then definitely don't get this. But its really cute still!

评论概述: The band is ridiculously huge and if you’re not a jeweler I would shop for something else.
评论详情: This watch is lovely. I was looking forward to wearing it. When it arrived the band was so large it slipped right off my wrist. Way too big for ANY female! If you’re not a jeweler I don’t really see how anybody was able to adjust theirs. I read through the reviews. I followed the instructions that were enclosed, which were quite vague. I attempted to do what the other reviewers did and I wound up bending the tool like a coat hanger and breaking the watch. So now I am out 25 bucks. If you don’t have the knowledge of repairing or working with jewelry or the dexterity I would look for something else. Sorry…..

评论概述: You're going to have to modify this watch band
评论详情: While this is a beautiful watch to look at, it is a pain to get it to fit!  Fortunately my husband had the right tools to take out links, but we had to keep taking off links, trying it on, taking off more links.  We took off about 8 or 9 links before it fit.  Even then, the watch face slides around to the underside of my wrist and I have to twist it back around to see the time.  When it arrives, don't expect to just put it on and go.  You have to modify the band before you can wear it.  I'm going to look for a watch with a "stretchy" band that will fit right away.
